name: cedears-manager
description: Desktop App para gestiÃ³n inteligente de cartera de CEDEARs con criterios ESG/veganos
author: CEDEARS Manager Team

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run electron:dev"
scripts.electron:dev: wait-on http://localhost:3000 http://localhost:3001 && cd electron && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build && npm run electron:build
scripts.dist: npm run build && cd electron && npm run dist
scripts.test: npm run frontend:test && npm run backend:test
scripts.lint: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.lint:complexity: npm run frontend:lint && npm run backend:lint
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint:complexity && npm run lint:duplicates
scripts.quality:report: npm run quality:setup && npm run quality:check && npm run quality:dashboard
scripts.quality:setup: rimraf quality-reports && mkdir quality-reports && mkdir quality-reports\eslint && mkdir quality-reports\duplicates
scripts.quality:html-reports: npm run quality:eslint-html && npm run lint:duplicates
scripts.quality:eslint-html: cd frontend && npx eslint src --format html -o ../quality-reports/eslint/frontend.html && cd ../backend && npx eslint src --format html -o ../quality-reports/eslint/backend.html
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
